testcase.classname: To Login New Tours Company Webpage
testcase.name: Successful Login
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Homepage page on URL "http://newtours.demoaut.com"........passed Then I should see "Welcome: Mercury Tours" as page title...................passed When I enter Username as "mercury"..........................................passed And I enter Password as "mercury"...........................................passed And I click on the Login button.............................................passed Then I should see the title as "Find a Flight: Mercury Tours:"..............passed

testcase.classname: To Test Ticket Booking for New Tours Company
testcase.name: Successful Flight Booking
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the home page...........................................passed When I submit username and password.........................................passed Then I should be logged in..................................................passed When I select number of passengers "1"......................................passed And I select Departing From as "London".....................................passed And I select Departure Month "April" and Day as "20"........................passed And I select Arriving In as "Paris".........................................passed And I select Arrival Month "April" and Day as "30"..........................passed Then I click on the find Flights Continue button............................passed Then I click on the reserve Flights Continue button.........................passed And I enter FirstName as "Customer" and LastName as "One"...................passed And I enter Card Number as "1000"...........................................passed And I click on the Secure Purchase button...................................passed Then I should see Flight confirmation page..................................passed

testcase.classname: To Test Ticket Booking for New Tours Company
testcase.name: Successful Flight Booking 2
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the home page...........................................passed When I submit username and password.........................................passed Then I should be logged in..................................................passed When I select number of passengers "1"......................................passed And I select Departing From as "Zurich".....................................passed And I select Departure Month "May" and Day as "20"..........................passed And I select Arriving In as "Portland"......................................passed And I select Arrival Month "May" and Day as "30"............................passed Then I click on the find Flights Continue button............................passed Then I click on the reserve Flights Continue button.........................passed And I enter FirstName as "Customer" and LastName as "Two"...................passed And I enter Card Number as "1001"...........................................passed And I click on the Secure Purchase button...................................passed Then I should see Flight confirmation page..................................passed
